reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 10/03: REBATE FOR ENERGY-EFFICIENT APPLIANCES
reg_info.act_under: Retail Sales Tax Act   Loi sur la taxe de vente au détail

content.content: 1. The following household appliances are prescribed by the Minister for the purposes of the definition of “appliance” in subsection 9.1 (1) of the Act: 1. Freezers. O. Reg. 10/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following household appliances are prescribed by the Minister for the purposes of the definition of “appliance” in subsection 9.1 (1) of the Act:

1. Freezers. O. Reg. 10/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 10/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 10/03, s. 2.
